mdRecord.dcterms:title: Daughters United Confederacy
mdRecord.dcterms:description: A Civil War era medal presented by the "United Daughters Confederacy. To the U.C.V. Awarded to Ashury Bishop Williams, 1st Lieutenant - Company I, 4th Virginia Regiment. Born January 6, 1847. Enlisted in Confederate Army in the Spring of 1864 at 17 years of age. Battle of Saltville? Discharged in April 1865.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: United States--History--Civil War, 1861-1865
Awards
Medals
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
